channel.title: RusePS | Grand Exchange | Party Dungeoneering | Duo Slayer | Tons of content!
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/zsicKWs.png[/img]
[url=http://"http://ruse-ps.com/"][img]http://i.imgur.com/3z9C4De.png[/img][/url][url=http://"http://ruse-ps.com/forum"][img]http://i.imgur.com/oVbCCRg.png[/img][/url][url=http://"http://ruse-ps.com/play"][img]http://i.imgur.com/lNTi95Z.png[/img][/url] [/CENTER]
[HR] Hello. Welcome to our advertisement thread! Are you looking for a Runescape Private Server which is packed with fun and unique content and that is updated regularly? Then you have come to the right place. Here at Ruse, we mix our content to make sure that our players receive the best possible gameplay experience as possible. Our server is completely written from scratch by our talented developers and that is why we can gurantee you 100% uptime. Our dedicated developers also gurantee regular updates, so what are you waiting for? Come and check us out!
[HR]
[CENTER] [spoiler="Synthesis Media"][img]http://i.imgur.com/k27Zd9v.jpg[/img] [/SPOILER] [SIZE=6][SPOILER="Detailed Media"][/SIZE] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7iHN2UG.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Gp8yIfu.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SYdDMsd.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/3KxR59V.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/phDLVPP.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/RUzfXml.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NQloTo3.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/u6WEmqL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6VZRLUD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Davi2aC.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sEMhbtT.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/IcnbLge.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VLkpivg.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/81Dk3hm.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/C6zJHGE.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/JEFusFW.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gMqun7p.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/pgN8Orw.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/C2ZE99v.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Gi5w9wi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qbcaj4L.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VABwXz6.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6Ep9q4X.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/E4gP1rC.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/j7ggl0C.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/25td0Zf.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Ti27sgm.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6KQK1Pm.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lC117tL.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/a9866be769e071fc01ed4c77e1bf0fa4.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/da1f0840683764a766d39e6ba27e67e9.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/3976e57bfb04b379ccebade183a968dc.gif[/img] [/SPOILER]
